website_summaries.verdict: A nice, contemporary look, and the drawers are a great feature. Some buyers warn that the installation can be a bit of a slog, however.
pros: Contemporary, elegant look with a cappuccino finish
Unique design combines a bookshelf with storage drawers
Shelves are wider than other models
cons: The instructions aren't great, and installation can be a bit tedious
You can overcome this a bit by inventorying all the parts before you start to make sure you received everything, and then talking a friend or mate into helping you build it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ladder bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: When the box came, we thought for sure there would be messed up wood pieces, but everything was intact as it is well boxed. The assembly was super easy, just a bit time consuming as is most furniture you have to put together. Took my husband and I about 2 hours. The drawers have a left and right side. You’ll know this because they won’t close unless they are put in correctly. The piece when finished is beautiful and just what we were looking for in the empty space we had next to our fireplace. The four drawers are such an added bonus. I wouldn’t hesitate buying again one if I wanted another one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: other than that it looks very sturdy and very nice
customer_reviews.text: I took a while to assemble it because the instructions only had pictures which were a little confusing and the screws were packaged out of sequence, other than that it looks very sturdy and very nice. I recommend labeling the parts and nails better and for the manufacturer to write better detailed instructions. The two side pieces were a bit 100% fitted either but everything else seemed to fit perfectly which was surprising for the fake wood build yourself model. I’d buy something similar again. I just wish that the price would drop because it’s slot of building for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Eliane

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality, easy assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality, but is sufficient for an area that doesn't get much traffic or use. Looks nice and is very stable. I put it together alone, but a second pair of hands to hold it in place is optimal. Am purchasing another for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: Torturously difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’ve assembled a fair amount of pressboard furniture in my years, but this one takes the prize for most awful. It’s incredibly difficult with just one person. It very easy to damage during assembly because pieces are precariously balanced, which is why it gets one star for the shallow cam depths that rip right through the pressboard if not handled with kid gloves. I badly damaged the side of drawer piece in a very visible way, but 2 hours into assembly I’m not turning back and will patch and glue the damage later. I wish I’d bought another closet maid bookcase that went together in 20 minutes instead of wasting my time and money on this shoddy piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are way off!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2. My husband spent 1 1/2 hours putting this together, thanks to very crappy directions on what should have been a quick build (he's very adept at such things). The assembled measurements are way off! The shelf was almost double in width from what it says! We are returning both, but now have to dismantle the one and figure out how to get it packaged correctly to send back. Total waste of time ! We will never buy from Coaster again!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Faulty manufacturing, but possible to fix and look good
customer_reviews.text: This one was tricky to put together because it was manufactured incorrectly. Each face of the drawer has a line cut in the back for the bottom of the drawer to fit. One drawer’s line is cut on the wrong end. It’s impossible to know until you put it all together and then the drawers won’t close together. I tried many different variations of putting the drawers in different orders before I figured this out. Once I did figure out which one was the problem, I was able to flip the face the opposite way and turn the handle around and get it all to fit together. It looks good once I fixed it, but it was definitely a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for displaying my family photos
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf, it looks beautiful and it seems very sturdy. It is exactly what I was looking for to display all of my framed photos, but better than other products I looked at because it is wider. You won't be disappointed. My husband assembled it for me and it wasn't too difficult, the most challenging part is that not all of the pieces were labeled very well. It would have made the assembly easier if all of the pieces were clearly labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dore

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to put together because pieces aren’t cut correctly
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice in picture advertisement however it is poorly made. The drawers do not line up, you are unable to slide and insert pieces because some parts are not cut correctly to fit. The instructions tell you to put pieces together by letter however you CANT read or determine what letter the pieces have. (see pictures) very frustrating! Like they say you get what you pay for!! It also took 2 hours to put together with all the issues.
customer_reviews.author: DWS1023

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the bookshelf once it's assembled
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the bookshelf once it's assembled, but assembly was really tedious and the instructions were vague at best. My bookshelf was packaged well, but was missing 2 drawer tracks. I didn't notice this until I had the entire thing assembled, after hours of frustration and swearing. Be sure that you do and inventory check before you attempt to assemble. Overall, I would recommend the product because it is nice to look at and offers quite a bit of storage. Just be prepared for an assembly battle if you can't manage to enlist a second pair of hands, and double check your item list before you begin!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great looks & storage!
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery although the carton was a bit banged up which caused some worry in case parts were damaged inside. But no, all parts - wooden & metal- were accounted for. This is definitely a two person job & took close to 2 hours to put together- that too by my handyman & his helper. All that I needed stored was taken care of, & contemporary design looks great!
customer_reviews.author: rh

customer_reviews.title: Much more space than expected
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are very sturdy, and look exactly as the picture suggests. There are four individual drawers on the bottom that hold quite a bit. Me and my fiance bought two and have them bookending a computer desk, as a quick fix for storage we used the shelves for his dvd collection and both of these shelves combined held nearly two hundred dvd's. They are much wider than your standard ladder shelves so they hold more nick nacks. I love them and they fit our house perfectly. The only downside was the assembly, it took a long time to put them together and at times the instructions didn't make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Theofanopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is perfect! It sits at the end of the sofa, directly in my husband's line of vision from his "spot" but does not interfere with his TV viewing. The storage is invaluable for games, exercise stuff, holiday CDs/DVDs, spare Roomba parts, etc. Construction is solid, sturdy, and lovely. I can't speak to assembly as my wannabe son-in-law did that for us. All in all, I am very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary p.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. It is so nice looking, and it's really a great setup. I think some of the people reviewing that the drawers are small are crazy. They aren't massive, but I fit a good amount in them... Plenty of room for books and plants, etc. It looks outstanding, and it's a really solid design. My only complaint is that the directions threw me off a bit, and I'm pretty good at putting this stuff together. Didn't notice till after I was done putting it together that one shelf was backwards... Really annoying, but it was easily fixed, and now we have an awesome shelf!
customer_reviews.author: STPJimmy

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect with the shelves and drawers
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I needed a nightstand and somewhere to put some books and knick knacks. It is perfect with the shelves and drawers. It looks nice while put together. I did just go to open one of the drawers and the face-plate fell off. My husband said he thinks he can fix the inserts they use to help it stay in place and we'll probably add some of the wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is gorgeous. I receive a lot of compliments on it. I made it myself without help and it looks like it's store bought and delivered. The only somewhat difficult part is that the hardware was not labeled but there's a picture and you can easily figure it out. I numbered all the pieces to make it easier. I love this bookshelf!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It took the 3rd time of ordering it, for it to arrive complete. Super happy, I kept trying. I'm using them as nightstands in my bedroom. My room looks amazing. Just know it takes a while to build ot, when doing it alone. Remember "E" draws go to the left and "F" draws to the right.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Pardo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bookshelf! I love the style and the 4 drawers are great for extra storage. The bottom shelf is large enough to fit my printer, and is sturdy enough to hold books. It was a little difficult to put together, but only because I did it by myself. It is a great addition to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Liz kelly

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to put together and took about 30 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and took about 30 minutes to accomplish from start to finish. I use this for our family's board games and reading books. It looks great in our living and complements our other furniture very well. Would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but......
customer_reviews.text: You better lay out all the pieces before so it doesn't take you forever!
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good for the price. Really opened the room up since it replaced a normal book shelf. Drawers are nice to have for things you don’t want to display.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of this shelf and it’s perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this shelf and it’s perfect for the space I intended to put it but, one of the drawers wouldn’t shut no matter which place we put it. The holes that were on it we misaligned. My husband had to go and screw his own holes on that specific drawer for it to fit and close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. But will say assemble took quite a bit of time. FYI this is 2 person assemble job. Not something I would recommend doing on your own. Quality is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Massive

customer_reviews.title: Good shelfing unit
customer_reviews.text: Good shelfing unit. Everything fit perfect and was easy to assemble. Would definetly recommend. Only small negative was that the covers for the holes keep peeling so will probably need to superglue them or something.
customer_reviews.author: PGS

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product and it is as sturdy as ...
customer_reviews.text: Others said It would take about two hours to put this together turned out they were right. For me no big deal. I took the time to glue joints according to the instructions. I am very happy with the product and it is as sturdy as it looks. I'd highly recommend this product to anyone considering to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just sayin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bookshelf with storage drawers to have it next to my desk. This is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted to keep my books, envelops, etc close to me. The top shelf can not hold books because it is narrow. I used it for decoration ( pictures and small vase). The 4 drawers are very useful and have a good size. Shipping was pretty fast. Item arrived within 4 days. Assembly took ~ 2 hours but it was worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Raju

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: A good buy for the money. It's a well designed piece. The assembly is on par with an IKEA product, so about a 3 hour assembly but it's worth it upon completion. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Undietaker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly sturdy shelves. Took about an hour to put one together but was well worth it. The drawers slide super easy, making it a very convenient unit. I loved it so much I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, got 2 of these. Look great in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item for the price and the quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift and liked it so much I am ordering a second one. One has my books and the other has my gaming system, DVR, etc on it. I have one case on either side of my fireplace. I put the item together myself with no issues. Nice piece of furniture and looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: We love this shelf! It was a little difficult to put together for one person but definitely easier and manageable with 2. It is made well and has a great finish. It looks exactly like it does in the picture! All the pieces were there and the instructions, once reviewed, were pretty easy to understand. It is a great addition to our living space.
customer_reviews.author: A. Montero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very functional and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Looks much more expensive than it was. High quality and very study.
customer_reviews.author: Eli - SC

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to assemble, however it does take a couple of hours due to there being so many parts. I got 2 so the second one went more quickly. I would recommend putting the drawers together in this order C and B, then add D then Add A and then E. The holes for C and A together seemed slightly off so this order corrected the problem. There were some little scuffs and chips in the pieces but they were in areas that were hidden. It seems sturdy and fairly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Petrolino

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE NIGHTMARE -PRE-DRILLED HOLES ARE OFF, INSTRUCTIONS ARE A MESS. ONE OF THE WOOD BEERS CRACKED DURING ASSEMBLY. THROWING I L IT AWAT. ITS A SHAME IT WOULD BE TOO MUCH RETURN. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: NYY

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is beautiful once assembled. Simple but VERY time consuming product to assemble!! Don't hesitate to buy but make sure you have a few hours to put together. Quality is on par with price. Looks great in office!
customer_reviews.author: Todd G. Civiello

customer_reviews.title: great shelf
customer_reviews.text: Good size, looks nice, only draw back was the time it took to put it together. One of the screws would also not go in was not aligned properly.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Looks great at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and size of this shelf, happy I chose this one. The instructions are minimal, but figured it out fine once I realized the numbers are intended to coordinate with the order the hardware is in the connected plastic bags and which ones were switched. Also the pieces you insert into the shelves to screw the bolts into are a pain in the ass, you have to really force them in. The worst thing was having to schedule a drop off time because the company they used only delivered during normal working hours...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but 1000 pieces to put together
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 hrs due to the instructions being nothing but pictures......... a lot of time wasted trying to figure out what goes where......
customer_reviews.author: misswright

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great against wall. Would buy again when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert l.

customer_reviews.title: Priced right, looks great...
customer_reviews.text: Any complaints about product quality may be due to challenges with assembly... 13 steps using 244 parts, pieces, and fasteners. But I had no problems putting it together. 🛠️🔩🔧🔓
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: It took over 10 days to get this and it arrived damaged. We are unable to even finish putting it together. The drawers are damaged. They are all chipped. The support where the shelves go are completely broken off. It is going to be a total pain to try and return. Really frustrated by this entire purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together, but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together, but good instructions. Once assembled (3 hours later), looks great and very sturdy. Received several compliments. Would recommend for someone who is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Norman G.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bookshelf! I bought this bookshelf for my mom and it looks great in her home office. Fairly easy to assembla as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Snow

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I'm even leaving a star is so ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm even leaving a star is so that I can leave a review. First of all this product is 10 inches narrower than it says it is and to top it off it came broken. Also the instructions are basically gibberish.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put together..not a one hr job as described.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible instructions...some of the wood parts were flimsy and fit poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I’m a 63 year old Gramma and I put it together by myself. Took me about 3 hours but was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Great bookcase! It was easy to assemble. Looks great and very sturdy. Price was very reasonable. The drawers offer a decent amount of storage.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: VERY ATTRACTIVE & STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with quality. It is a very attractive piece in our breakfast nook. Took about (2) hours to assemble with (2) people. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J. Hauck, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf looks just like the picture. It took a while to assemble, but afterwards seems very strong. It looks high quality and is an excellent place to display things.
customer_reviews.author: Pinde

customer_reviews.title: good instructions with easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly, packed well without damage, good instructions with easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A Schockweiler

customer_reviews.title: super poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: completely a nightmare to assemble, super poor build quality, comes damaged, longest issue to get returned. BEWARE. looks good
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I have this in my bedroom and have displayed several ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my bedroom and have displayed several items on the shelves as well as used the 4 drawers for socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Carter

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love how nice it is easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, takes a little time to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bookshelf with a the drawers for my office. Good quality and came with some nice finishes. Took a while to put together though!
customer_reviews.author: Courtny Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Time
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice once done but as others have stated, it does take a long time to put it together. I have one of the drawers not align but customer service was really quick to respond and take care of problem.
customer_reviews.author: LGH - Kansas

customer_reviews.title: The piece looks great. Only issue I see is that the #19 ...
customer_reviews.text: The piece looks great. Only issue I see is that the #19 and #16 screws are switched, as to what hole they go in. That added some time and frustration, total time to put together was 3+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put together and a few scratches that came when shipped but the outcome looks great!
customer_reviews.author: KD0UTE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good for what its worth. fits our basic needs
customer_reviews.author: sir buystuff

customer_reviews.title: i just like to use one word perfect
customer_reviews.text: i just like to use one word perfect! a beautiful addition to the setting area If you are looking to get one do not think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and solid....Came in a big box with 0 damage great job on it...i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pan_ams16

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: cheap construction as you would expect. Took awhile to put together, but looks great. I would recommend if you like this look.
customer_reviews.author: i'll try anything

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks beautiful and holds everything up nice and looks so perfect i cant even describe it. money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Cristofer Henao

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but like a jigsaw puzzle to put together!
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf itself was great and exactly as pictured, but the putting it together took over 2 hours! There was like a gazillion pieces...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome contemporary bookcase. Easy to assemble and looks very elegant and high end!
customer_reviews.author: ToriphileSophia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and the drawers on the bottom made me by ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and the drawers on the bottom made me by this, it's different than all the other ladder bookshelves out there.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: they look great. Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 for the sides of our fireplace. they look great. Very easy to put together. I just wish they were taller.
customer_reviews.author: V Marzette

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Tons of complements from friends and family. Great additions to our family room. Fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and expensive looking. I put it together by myself in about 3 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelfs. Plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality great product shipped fast. This product looks beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love the piece but not putting it together lol
customer_reviews.author: kathleen whalen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and came well packed. The directions for assembly were a bit hard to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love the Item- Deceived by the Description
customer_reviews.text: Love the item, but seller needs to change the post details. 1- Assembly is definitely required. It comes in pieces. This was a bummer for me as I expected it to be fully assembled. 2- There are 4 shelves and 4 drawers, not 2.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ... the directions were straight forward and the piece looks great! Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to put together (about 2+ hours) but the directions were straight forward and the piece looks great! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints but think for the price it could be made of better materials.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Exactly as advertised. No complaints but think for the price it could be made of better materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful peace of furniture!!! With a very large store room !! Easy to ensamble.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite pieces of furniture. I was missing a screw, but it holds fine.
customer_reviews.author: AprilSH

customer_reviews.title: the bookshelf looks very nice and seems sturdy enough for decorative items
customer_reviews.text: Entirely too many pieces!!!! Also, the letters, in some instances, are not clearly marked. Once you get passed all of that, the bookshelf looks very nice and seems sturdy enough for decorative items.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Watkins

customer_reviews.title: great living room piece
customer_reviews.text: great piece for my living room. D. id take a while to put together but that's because there are so many pieces, not due to difficulty. better to have a second person to help

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to get together, however it was worth it. I love my new bookshelf. Also was really impressed with how fast it got here.

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely perfect. It looks so nice
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect. It looks so nice. Like the reviews stated it did take 3 hrs to put together however, It was not difficult and had no problems.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece, time consuming to put together. Would definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations but PLEASE take the no assembly required ...
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations but PLEASE take the no assembly required off the ad for it. It's very misleading. Takes one person about 2 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Carlton R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, slightly tough to assemble, but it worked out! Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Przybylinski

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was very heavy and had so many pieces!! Not easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece of furniture, but the drawers don't fit square.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Actual build quality for the drawers is not early as pictures or would be expected.
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased this ladder bookshelf because of the drawer storage at the bottom. The width of the book case also made for a much nicer fit into the chosen space in our home. Assembly wasn't problematic, and for the most part it goes together well. However, all four drawers have identical part numbers/letters, and all go together identically. Unfortunately when the unit is fully assembled the drawers clearly aren't all made the same. The center line for the drawers doesn't line up, and in fact unless you force them partly off the rails you can't get them to even fully close. I'm going to email the manufacturer and see what response is given, but I'm fully less than impressed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love my shelf! I had bought the smaller one with 2 drawars previously and really liked it so I bought this one and love it. The color blends well with my black and green furniture. It came sooner than expected and packaged well. No dented or scratched pieces. It was fairly easy to assemble. I would recommend this shelf if you are looking for any type of leaning bookshelf, plus the drawars are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: The 4 drawers hold paper and packages of labels for the copier and the shelves are nice to display my decorations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office. The 4 drawers hold paper and packages of labels for the copier and the shelves are nice to display my decorations, pictures, etc. My coach put it together by himself in two hours. I only had to help hold it once for him. I have had many, many compliments on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jla127

customer_reviews.title: but once it was done I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put together, but once it was done I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brown

customer_reviews.title: It looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture. It's stride, heavy, and a nice dark chocolate color. I love it! It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Brock

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The pre-drilled holes in one of the drawers were off by 1/4 inch, making it impossible to close.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Solid, Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, but difficult to put together by yourself. There are a lot of pieces and pretty heavy. I like the look. I purchased 2 to go on each side of my fireplace. It turned out really well. I like it a lot. We get many compliments on the living room.
customer_reviews.author: DNF

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but very difficult to assemble. Unless you're good at that kind of thing, which I am not. I love it tho!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Awesone
customer_reviews.text: Had amazon home services put this together for me, a little confusing on the directions, but 2 hours later was put together. This is a great addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Raven A. Fiebig

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful unit - not so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful unit - not so easy to put together. Takes a little patience in a few hours but well worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Sundancer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Too much trouble!
customer_reviews.text: This weights 70 lbs in the box! It is in a ton of pieces that don't fit together easily. It took 2hrs to put one drawer together. You get it put together and then the last piece won't fit so you have to take it all apart and start all over. It was too hard. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Colella Leaning 4-Drawer Ladder Bookcase Cappuccino
product_meta.description: Enjoy sleek style and convenient functionality. With multiple options for storage, this ladder bookcase is tasteful and versatile. Three sturdy shelves are elegantly suspended over a large, lower cabinet with four drawers. The drawers feature Euro glides for smooth and gentle ease of use. Finished in rich cappuccino, this bookcase adds eye-catching glamour to any room.
feature_bullets: Weight limit: From top bottom shelf - 22 lbs, 33 lbs, 33 lbs
